nodes.bodyText: Is it expected that extensions are removed from here? We should be listing all of the stuff that camel-quarkus supports.

nodes.bodyText: Yes, I am a proper Groovy noob! If there was a plugin to run Java as a script, I'd very much prefer writing it in Java :)
